title: Find LCD
text: The least common denominator of $$\frac{98}{154}$$ and $$\frac{-7}{p}$$ is 154p.

title: Multiply LCD Both Sides
text: Through multiplying both sides by LCD, we get $$98p=-7\times154$$.

title: Isolate p on One side
text: We can divide by 98 on both sides and get $$p=-11$$ as the final answer.
